function getCreateTimeAsFileName() {

Â  Â  Â var d = new Date();

Â  Â  Â var year = d.getFullYear();

Â  Â  Â var time = year+"m"+month+"d"+day+"h"+hour+"m"+minute+"s"+second;

Â  Â  Â return time;

}

  

  

// execute command function

  

async function executeCommand() {

Â  Â  Â const fileName = "index.md";

Â  Â  Â const { stdout, stderr } = await exec('hugo new post/' + getCreateTimeAsFileName() +'/'+fileName,{cwd: app.fileManager.vault.adapter.basePath});

Â  Â  Â console.log('stderr:', stderr);

Â  Â  Â if (stdout) {

Â  Â  Â }else{

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â new Notice("New Blog Create Faild. "+stderr)

Â  Â  Â }

}

  

  

module.exports = async function(context, req) {

}
